formatted_address: Encorp Marina, 2, Persiaran Puteri Selatan, Puteri Harbour, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor, Malaysia
name: RESTORAN TKR

reviews.text:
Like many others, I checked the reviews before coming, 50% were good, 50% not so great. Decided to gamble and give it a try.

I ordered Maggi goreng with fried egg, 2 plain roti canai, 1 roti bom, 1 roti telur, iced Nescafe, and iced tea O. Despite the crowd, everything was served within 20 minutes. Staff were friendly and attentive.

The total came to only RM26, very reasonable for the portion and variety!

Great for a quick meal before heading to Legoland.

You can get tasty food for low prices here. Some dishes can be quite spicy, though. Not sure how much it costs to get a plate with your choice of meats and vegetables, but it may be a better option if youâ€™re feeling hungry, as portions can be small for the items on the menu. Prices are low, so you canâ€™t expect the largest portions, but the servings are decent value.

We have been to this restaurant many times, but this time the experience was the worst. Their roasted chicken was not fresh and overly spicy, becoming extremely unpalatable. I sincerely advise everyone not to come and try it.

This nasi lemak like porridge.... ðŸ˜¤ Ask the counter person to cancel but he said will change for us and I said ok, we waited for more then 40min still never come. The service is to terrible and never take concern also.  That star also i Don't want to give but to review need to put star... This is terrible restoran that I have eaten.... Other TKR all ok but here sorry...ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ Really ruined my day..... ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤

I think the business owner should have a mindset of service and kindness. I've been here occasionally for mant years but every time here, either owner or staff put me off.  He should put greater effort in training the staff in terms of efficiency and service. The food is okay and the location is perfect. However, the quality of service is very low. There are many staff but no one was even paying attention when I was awaiting and asking for help. Or they just ignore or pretend not to notice. It happened so many times. Probably today's visit would be my last visit to this restaurant. I feel not good whenver I visit here.

vicinity: Encorp Marina, 2, Persiaran Puteri Selatan, Puteri Harbour, Iskandar Puteri
